description:
In contrast with her http://anidb.net/ch1913 [Fate/stay night counterpart], Illya has had a normal childhood, growing up with no knowledge of magic or the Holy Grail War. She lives with her brother http://anidb.net/ch1904 [Shirou] and is looked after by her maids http://anidb.net/ch1939 [Leysritt] and http://anidb.net/ch1934 [Sella] when her parents http://anidb.net/ch1919 [Kiritsugu] and http://anidb.net/ch25939 [Irisviel] are away.
She is a fan of http://anidb.net/t2503 [magical girl] anime, and daydreams about becoming one. When she encounters a magic wand named http://anidb.net/ch54376 [Magical Ruby], Illya is tricked into signing a contract and http://anidb.net/ch42302 [becoming a magical girl].
Source: Wikipedia
name: Illyasviel von Einzbern
